message.body: So I saw a bunch of dropped keys around a blue portal and I picked them all up. Y/n??
Can be good for linking, which can help you level up quickly! Just don't let your inventory get super clogged up with keys. Decent rule of thumb is to ne
ver hold on to more than 125 or so
Do you think some blue dude left them there for someone else and I busted up their plan?
Probably not. Sometimes people dump them when their inventory is full because it's faster than recycling them
Today I discovered "comm" (someone said welcome!) and subsequently, that all my links are "derp links" :/ I just link everything I can link? Give em hell at the anomaly!
Lol. I'll teach you about derp links. Just tell them you have a friend who's going to teach you the ropes after the anomaly and you're sorry if you block
Haha oh shit, sorry! I literally link everything I see because I can never tell when it will make a little field and links are nice? Haha. It was 4everseptember (good name!)
I'll be in va this weekend but I wish I could come to the ingress party! I'm way more into it than I expected
That's my friend Annie! She's very nice. You didn't do anything wrong :)
